content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option >the pattern in **danish** is available here 2 thank you marianneho /people/marianneho for your contribution call them cherry blossoms is my first fully stranded toe-up sock pattern it s the perfect pattern to play with reversed colours or colour dominance --- **pattern features ** - knitted toe-up - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - only one size available 72 sts foot and leg lengths are adjustable as per pattern - heel flap under the heel followed by a heel back gusset - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork - estimated yardage roughly equal amounts of mc and cc 50 grams of each should be more than enough 1 https //payhip com/b/q4vg 2 https //strikkeglad dk/25783/kirsebaerblomster/
